"""
 Check installed business templates one 
 by one. If one of the business templates does not 
 use the latest revision, then we need to install.
 """
 # Initialize variables
 portal = context.getPortalObject()
 portal_templates = portal.portal_templates
 signature = portal.ERP5Site_getUpgraderSignature()
 message_list = []
 
 previous_bt5_id = None
 bt5_counter = 0
 available_bt5_list = portal_templates.getRepositoryBusinessTemplateList(newest_only=True)
 available_bt5_id_list = [x.title for x in available_bt5_list]
 required_bt5_id_list = signature.get('required_bt5_id_list', [])
 if len(required_bt5_id_list) == 0:
 # by default, we try to upgrade all business templates from repositories.
 required_bt5_id_list = [i.title for i in available_bt5_list]
 upgradable_bt5_id_list = signature.get('upgradable_bt5_id_list', [])
 reinstallable_bt5_id_list = signature.get('reinstallable_bt5_id_list', signature.get('reinstalable_bt5_id_list', []))
 before_triggered_bt5_id_dict = signature.get('before_triggered_bt5_id_dict', [])
 after_triggered_bt5_id_dict = signature.get('after_triggered_bt5_id_dict', [])
 update_catalog_bt5_id_list = signature.get('update_catalog_bt5_id_list', [])
 
 bt5_id_list = dict([(x, True) for x in list(required_bt5_id_list) + \
 list(upgradable_bt5_id_list) + \
 list(reinstallable_bt5_id_list) \
 if x in available_bt5_id_list]).keys()
 
 # sort by dependencies
 bt5_list = [portal_templates.decodeRepositoryBusinessTemplateUid(x.uid) for x in \
 available_bt5_list if x.title in bt5_id_list]
 bt5_list = portal_templates.sortBusinessTemplateList(bt5_list)
 
 installed_bt5_title_list = [o.getTitle() for o in portal_templates.getInstalledBusinessTemplateList()]
 
 bt5_counter = portal_templates.countFolder()[0][0]
 
 def installBT5(bt5_url, bt5_title, previous_bt5, bt5_counter, force=False):
 bt5_id = "%s_%s" % (bt5_counter, bt5_title)
 kw = dict(activity="SQLQueue", tag=bt5_id)
 if previous_bt5 is not None:
 kw['after_tag'] = previous_bt5
 # We must make sure all documents from previous installations 
 # are already indexed (specially categories).
 kw['after_method_id'] = "immediateReindexObject"
 update_catalog = bt5_title in update_catalog_bt5_id_list
 before_triggered_bt5_id_list = before_triggered_bt5_id_dict.get(bt5_title, ())
 after_triggered_bt5_id_list = after_triggered_bt5_id_dict.get(bt5_title, ())
 keep_original_list = signature.get('keep_original_dict', {}).get(bt5_title, ())
 if upgrade:
 portal_templates.activate(**kw).updateBusinessTemplateFromUrl(
 bt5_url, # id=bt5_id, 
 keep_original_list=keep_original_list,
 before_triggered_bt5_id_list=before_triggered_bt5_id_list,
 after_triggered_bt5_id_list=after_triggered_bt5_id_list,
 update_catalog=update_catalog,
 reinstall=force)
 previous_bt5_id = bt5_id
 bt5_counter += 1
 message_list.append("\tInstall %s from %s" % (bt5_title, bt5_url))
 return bt5_id
 
 previous_bt5 = None
 for repository, bt5_id in bt5_list:
 new_bt = [x for x in available_bt5_list \
 if portal_templates.decodeRepositoryBusinessTemplateUid(x.uid) == (repository, bt5_id)][0]
 bt5_url = '/'.join((repository, bt5_id))
 bt5_title = new_bt.title
 if bt5_title in reinstallable_bt5_id_list:
 bt5_id = installBT5(bt5_url, bt5_title, previous_bt5, bt5_counter, force=True)
 previous_bt5 = bt5_id
 else:
 installed_bt = portal_templates.getInstalledBusinessTemplate(bt5_title, strict=True)
 if installed_bt is not None:
 if int(installed_bt.getRevision() or 0) >= int(new_bt.revision or 0):
 continue
 if bt5_title in required_bt5_id_list:
 bt5_counter += 1
 bt5_id = installBT5(bt5_url, bt5_title, previous_bt5, bt5_counter)
 previous_bt5 = bt5_id
 elif bt5_title in installed_bt5_title_list: # update_bt5_id_list
 bt5_counter += 1
 bt5_id = installBT5(bt5_url, bt5_title, previous_bt5, bt5_counter)
 previous_bt5 = bt5_id
 
 message_list.append("Business templates will be installed using activities.")
 
 return message_list
